item.itunes:author: Robert Gold
item.description:
BusinessCast 247 pulls back the screen on kids' privacy with David Fono, Co-Founder of Atmosphere Industries.  Along with his partner Kate Raynes-Goldie, Atmosphere has launched The Watchers, an effort funded by the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada.  The full story of the project, and how they're teaching kids about privacy and trust online can be found at GamingPrivacy.org. The result? Engaged and educated young people online - which translates into more intelligent ecommerce.  Get the whole story, only on the BusinessCast.
